summary: Sustain refers to concepts and practices aimed at creating long-lasting, balanced systems that benefit both the planet and its inhabitants. It emphasizes innovation through decentralized and regenerative design, challenging modern production's exploitative nature. By focusing on sustainability, a more resilient, creative, and interconnected society can emerge, fostering adaptability and resilience.
excerpt: A vision of innovation that enhances both our planet and its people through decentralized and regenerative design. This article explores creating sustainable, transformative ecosystems.
